title: Can you recommend some Day6 and The Rose songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Rose: She’s in The Rain, Sorry, Red, Insomnia, And Take Me Down Ok First Off I cry every time I listen to She’s in the rain and Sorry cause they are such emotional and beautiful songs and they have so much meaning behind them and they overall just make me sob, but they are still really good songs Day6: Shoot Me, Congratulations, I Smile, I Loved You, When You Love Someone and Sweet Chaos Second I Loved You and When You Love Someone are both connected to make a little story which i love Third watching Day6 MV are like watching a whole K-Drama but like it low-key makes them more fun to watch

As for The Rose, listen to Strangers (Strangers From Hell OST). Great song, Woosung's vocals are amazing. DAY6 is probably my favorite group, but there are a few songs that I like a little more than the others… I Need Somebody (This song deserves a Grammy), 그럴 텐데 (I Would), Stop The Rain, You Were Beautiful (ENG & KOR version), Congratulations, Wish (바래), I'll try (노력해볼게요), COLORS, and I Loved You And so many more.

I just got into both bands, so I don’t know all of their music. And I actually came here to get some recommendations as well especially on Day6, cause I know The rose a little better. But I’ll leave some recommendations anyway. DAY6: As I said, I haven’t heard a lot of their music, but their song “Shoot me” was the one who made me invested and wanted to learn more about them and here some of their other songs. “Sweet chaos” is also a great song! The rose: My favorite is definitely “she’s in the rain” it’s such a beautiful song, and if the song itself doesn’t make you cry, it will when you read the lyrics…Other songs I really like from them are, “Sorry”, “Baby” and “Red”

I stan day6 more so here’s some songs I really like also some By the rose DAY6: sweet chaos Shoot me Days gone by Not fine Chocolate I wait Dance dance Hurt road How to love Wanna go back Deep in love 36247 Best part For me Finale The rose : baby like we used to sorry shes in the rain candy (so good ) I.L.Y Insomnia I don’t know you California with you Red

I don’t listen to The Rose as much as I do to Day6, but I recommend checking out “Sorry” and “I.L.Y” by The Rose. Also, recently they performed a cover of The Script’s “Breakeven”! As for Day6, all their songs are amazing and never disappoint! One of the first songs I listened to is “Congratulations”, there is the English version of that; you should check the original and the English versions! “Letting Go” by Day6 is really good and you can feel the emotions they pour into the song and the music video. You should listen to all their songs! haha

for day6 songs: if you’re into upbeat, i recommend listening to: dance dance, be lazy, freely, blood, i wish, like that sun, my day, hunt, sing me, and better better if you’re into ballads: hi hello, when you love someone, i need somebody, goodbye winter, i would, and, i’ll try, i smile, and colors if you like to listen to angry songs (im sorry i dont know another name for those type of songs): how can i say, 121U, pouring, breaking down, stop the rain, and falling. i really don’t know much about the rose, but i suggest you to listen to i.l.y.
